title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 81-2.7 - Annual reporting for companies engaged directly in business pursuant to section 1714 of the insurance law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 81-2.7 - Annual reporting for companies engaged directly in business pursuant to section 1714 of the insurance law

State Regulations

On or before May 1st of each year an annual report on form ARA (see Appendix 22, infra) shall be filed for every activity engaged in directly by the domestic life insurer under section
1714
of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
81-2.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
